entry.def: Someone who is abstracted is thinking so deeply that they are not fully aware of what is happening around them.

example.ex: Meg was so abstracted she scarcely noticed that the train had stopped...
example.tran: 梅格想得出了神，几乎没有注意到火车已经停了。

example.ex: The same abstracted look was still on his face.
